original_text: The Bible says this: ‘When a man marries, he leaves his father and his mother. Instead, God joins the man and his wife together. The two people become like one body.’
korean_text: 그러므로 사람이 부모를 떠나 그의 아내와 합하여 그 둘이 한 육체가 될지니

sentences.original_text: he leaves his father and his mother.
Instead, God joins the man and his wife together.
sentences.korean_translation: 대신, 하나님은 그 남자와 그의 아내를 함께 연결하십니다.

sentences.original_text: The two people become like one body.
sentences.korean_translation: 두 사람은 한 몸과 같이 됩니다.
